overview: The secret of a new Naples, its coming out of itself to begin again. A Naples that no longer wants to be complacent about being eternally fragile, misunderstood, constantly taking refuge in its Appucundria (a painful sadness that approaches melancholy but also drags along boredom, dissatisfaction and loneliness), a Naples tired of being at the mercy of everyone, in finding itself in the pure and simple survival of itself, returning to its full control.
title: The City Rises
